00025 class KMCParallel : public KMCCalculator

00034     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00035     // VSSM Group BOXED      //
00036     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00037     
00038     class NodeBoxed;
00039     
00040     template<typename event_t>
00041     class VSSMGroupBoxed
00042     {
00043     public:
00044         
00045         VSSMGroupBoxed() { _acc_rate.push_back(0); }
00046        ~VSSMGroupBoxed() {};
00047 
00048         void        SetRNG(Random2 *rng) { _random = rng; }
00049        
00050         void        AddEvent(event_t *event);
00051         double      Rate() { return _acc_rate.back(); };
00052         double      WaitingTime() { return _waiting_time; }
00053         void        UpdateWaitingTime();
00054         
00055         void        OnExecute();
00056         event_t    *getEvent(int idx) { return _events[idx]; }
00057 
00058     protected:
00059 
00060         event_t     *SelectEvent_LinearSearch();
00061         event_t     *SelectEvent_BinarySearch();
00062 
00063         std::vector<event_t*>       _events;
00064         std::vector<double>         _acc_rate;
00065         double                      _waiting_time;
00066         Random2                    *_random;
00067     };
00068     
00069     
00070     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00071     // Node BOXED            //
00072     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00073     
00074     struct LinkBoxed;
00075     
00076     class NodeBoxed : public VSSMGroupBoxed<LinkBoxed>
00077     {
00078     public:
00079         
00080         NodeBoxed(int id) : _id(id), _occ(0.0) {};
00081        ~NodeBoxed() {};
00082        
00083         void OnExecute() { 
00084             _occ += WaitingTime();
00085             VSSMGroupBoxed<LinkBoxed>::OnExecute();
00086         }
00087         
00088         void Reset() { _occ = 0.0; }
00089         
00090         int     _id;
00091         double  _occ;
00092     };
00093     
00094     
00095     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00096     // Link BOXED            //
00097     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00098     
00099     class KMCSingleOp;
00100     
00101     struct LinkBoxed 
00102     {
00103         LinkBoxed(NodeBoxed *dest, double rate, vec dr, KMCSingleOp *master) 
00104                 : _dest(dest), _rate(rate), _dr(dr), _master(master) {};
00105        ~LinkBoxed() {};
00106        
00107        double     Rate() { return _rate; }
00108        void       OnExecute() { _master->Step(_dr, _dest); }
00109        
00110        double           _rate;
00111        NodeBoxed       *_dest;
00112        vec              _dr;
00113        KMCSingleOp     *_master;
00114     };
00115     
00116     
00117     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00118     // KMC OPERATOR          //
00119     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00120     
00121     class KMCSingleOp : public Thread
00122     {
00123     public:
00124         
00125         KMCSingleOp(int id, KMCParallel *master) : _id(id), _master(master) {};
00126        ~KMCSingleOp() {};
00127        
00128         int     getId() { return _id; }
00129         void    setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00130         
00131         void    InitSlotData();
00132         void    Run(void);
00133         
00134         void    EvalKMC();
00135         void    LoadGraph();
00136         void    RunKMC(void);
00137         void    WriteOcc(void);
00138         void    Reset();
00139         
00140         void    Step(vec &dr, NodeBoxed *dest) { _pos += dr; _current = dest; }
00141         
00142     
00143     private:
00144         
00145         int                     _id;
00146         KMCParallel            *_master; 
00147         Random2                 _random;
00148         
00149         map<int,NodeBoxed* >    _nodes_lookup;
00150         vector< NodeBoxed* >    _nodes;
00151         map<int,NodeBoxed* >    _injection_lookup;
00152         vector< NodeBoxed* >    _injection;  
00153         
00154         vec                     _pos;
00155         NodeBoxed              *_current;
00156     };
00157

00190 void KMCParallel::Initialize(const char* filename, Property *options) {
00191     
00192     cout << "Initialize "
00193          << flush;
00194     
00195     cout << endl
00196          << "... KMCParallel "
00197          << flush;   
00198     
00199     cout << endl 
00200          << "... ... Initialize KMCParallel with " << _nThreads << " threads. "
00201          << flush;
00202     
00203     // Init. master parameters
00204     string key  = "options.kmcparallel";
00205     _stateFile  = filename;
00206     _maverick   = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
00207 
00208     _runtime    = options->get(key+".runtime").as<double>();
00209     _outtime    = options->get(key+".outtime").as<double>();
00210     
00211     _seed       = options->get(key+".seed").as<int>();
00212     _injName    = options->get(key+".injection").as<string>();
00213     _channel    = options->get(key+".channel").as<string>();
00214     _NRuns      = options->get(key+".runs").as<int>();
00215     _nextRun    = 1;
00216     
00217     _outFile    = options->get(key+".output").as<string>();
00218     
00219     // Init. master RNG
00220     srand(_seed);
00221     cout << endl << "... ... Master: " << flush;
00222     _seeder.init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00223     
00224 }

00226 
00227 bool KMCParallel::EvaluateFrame() {
00228     
00229     cout << "Evaluate Frame " << endl;
00230     cout << "... KMCParallel" << endl;
00231     
00232     vector<KMCSingleOp*> kmcOps;
00233     
00234     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; ++id) {
00235         KMCSingleOp *newOp = new KMCSingleOp(id, this);
00236         kmcOps.push_back(newOp);
00237     }
00238     
00239     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; ++id) {
00240         kmcOps[id]->InitSlotData();
00241     }
00242     
00243     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; ++id) {
00244         kmcOps[id]->Start();
00245     }
00246     
00247     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; ++id) {
00248         kmcOps[id]->WaitDone();
00249     }
00250     
00251     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; ++id) {
00252         delete kmcOps[id];
00253     }
00254     
00255     kmcOps.clear();
00256     
00257     
00258     FILE *out;
00259     out = fopen(_outFile.c_str(),"w");
00260     
00261     map< int, vector<vec> > ::iterator mit;
00262     vector<vec> ::iterator vit;
00263     vec AVGVEL = vec(0,0,0);
00264     int AVG_N  = 0;
00265     
00266     for (mit = _log_inj_vel.begin();
00267          mit != _log_inj_vel.end();
00268          ++mit) {
00269         for (vit = (*mit).second.begin(); 
00270              vit < (*mit).second.end();
00271              ++vit) {
00272             fprintf(out, "%5d %4.7e %4.7e %4.7e \n",
00273               (*mit).first, (*vit).getX(), (*vit).getY(), (*vit).getZ());
00274             AVGVEL += (*vit);
00275             AVG_N  += 1;
00276         }
00277     }   
00278     
00279     AVGVEL /= AVG_N;
00280     fprintf(out, "AVG VELOCITY %4.7e %4.7e %4.7e \n", 
00281             AVGVEL.getX(), AVGVEL.getY(), AVGVEL.getZ());    
00282     fclose(out);
00283     
00284     cout << "... ... AVG VELOCITY = " << AVGVEL << " m/s." << endl;
00285 }
00286 
00287 
00288 bool KMCParallel::RequestNextInjection(int opId) {
00289     
00290     _injMutex.Lock();
00291     
00292     bool doNext = false;
00293     
00294     if (_nextRun > _NRuns) {
00295         doNext = false;
00296     }
00297     else {
00298         
00299         cout << ""
00300              << "... ... OP " << opId << " "
00301              << "starting injection run " 
00302              << _nextRun << "/" << _NRuns
00303              << ". " << endl;
00304         
00305         ++_nextRun;
00306         doNext = true;
00307     }
00308     
00309     _injMutex.Unlock();
00310     
00311     return doNext;
00312 }

00320 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::InitSlotData() {
00321     
00322     // Initialise random-number generator
00323     cout << "... ... OP " << this->_id << ": " << flush;
00324     this->_random.init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00325     
00326     Database db;
00327     db.Open(_master->_stateFile);
00328     
00329     if (_master->_maverick) {
00330         cout << flush
00331              << "... ... Loading graph from " << _master->_stateFile
00332              << endl;
00333     }
00334     
00335     // Load segments <=> nodes
00336     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT id, name FROM segments;");
00337     
00338     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00339         
00340         int     id      = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00341         string  name    = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00342         
00343         NodeBoxed *newnode = new NodeBoxed(id);
00344         newnode->SetRNG(&this->_random);
00345         
00346         _nodes.push_back(newnode);
00347         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00348         
00349         if (wildcmp(_master->_injName.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00350             _injection.push_back(newnode);
00351             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00352         }
00353     }
00354     
00355     delete stmt;
00356     
00357     // Load pairs <=> links
00358     int linkCount = 0;
00359     if (_master->_channel == "hole") {
00360         stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT seg1,    seg2, "
00361                                  "rate12h, rate21h, "
00362                                  "drX, drY, drZ "
00363                           "FROM   pairs;");
00364     }
00365     else if (_master->_channel == "electron") {
00366         stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT seg1,    seg2, "
00367                                  "rate12e, rate21e, "
00368                                  "drX, drY, drZ "
00369                           "FROM   pairs;");
00370     }
00371     else {
00372         throw std::runtime_error(" Invalid channel option '" +
00373                                    _master->_channel + "'. ");
00374     }
00375     
00376     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00377         
00378         NodeBoxed *node1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00379         NodeBoxed *node2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00380         
00381         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00382         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00383         
00384         vec dr = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), 
00385                      stmt->Column<double>(5),
00386                      stmt->Column<double>(6));
00387         
00388         node1->AddEvent(new LinkBoxed(node2, rate12, dr, this));
00389         node2->AddEvent(new LinkBoxed(node1, rate21, -dr, this));
00390         ++(++linkCount);
00391     }
00392     
00393     delete stmt;
00394     stmt = NULL;
00395     
00396     if (_master->_maverick) {
00397         cout << flush
00398              << "... ... Created graph with "
00399              << _nodes.size() << " nodes, "
00400              << linkCount << " links. "
00401              << endl;
00402     }    
00403 }

00406 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::LoadGraph() {
00407     ; // ::InitSlotData()
00408 }
00409 
00410 
00411 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::Run(void) {
00412     
00413     while (true) {
00414         
00415         bool doNext = _master->RequestNextInjection(this->_id);
00416         
00417         if (!doNext) { break; }
00418         else { this->EvalKMC(); }        
00419     }
00420 }
00421 
00422 
00423 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::EvalKMC() {
00424 
00425     // Pick injection site
00426     int inj = _random.rand_uniform_int(_injection.size());
00427     _current = _injection[inj];
00428     _current->UpdateWaitingTime();
00429     _pos = vec(0,0,0);
00430     
00431     if (_master->_maverick) {
00432         cout << "... ... ... Starting run at node " 
00433              << _current->_id << " (" << inj << "). "
00434              << endl;
00435     }
00436     
00437     // Init KMC
00438     int    steps = 0;
00439     double t_run = 0.0;
00440     double t_out = _master->_outtime;
00441     double t_max = _master->_runtime;
00442         
00443     // Prepare trajectory log file
00444     FILE *out;
00445     string logTrajFile = "log_traj_" 
00446                        + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_id) 
00447                        + ".dat";
00448     out = fopen(logTrajFile.c_str(), "a");
00449     fprintf(out, "Injection at node %5d \n", inj);
00450     fprintf(out, "%5d %4.7e %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", 
00451             _current->_id, t_run, _pos.getX(), _pos.getY(), _pos.getZ());
00452     
00453     // Run KMC
00454     while (t_run < t_max) {
00455         
00456         t_run += _current->WaitingTime();
00457         _current->OnExecute();
00458         
00459         if (t_run > t_out) {
00460             t_out = t_run + _master->_outtime;
00461             fprintf(out, "%5d %4.7e %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", 
00462             _current->_id, t_run, _pos.getX(), _pos.getY(), _pos.getZ());            
00463         }
00464         
00465         ++steps;
00466     }
00467     fprintf(out, "%5d %4.7e %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n", 
00468     _current->_id, t_run, _pos.getX(), _pos.getY(), _pos.getZ()); 
00469     fprintf(out, "Finished KMC in %9d steps. \n", steps);
00470     fprintf(out, "AVG velocity %4.7e %4.7e %4.7e \n\n",
00471                    (_pos/t_run*1e-9).getX(), 
00472                    (_pos/t_run*1e-9).getY(), 
00473                    (_pos/t_run*1e-9).getZ());
00474     fclose(out);
00475     
00476     _master->_logMutex.Lock();
00477     _master->_log_inj_vel[inj].push_back(_pos/t_run*1e-9);
00478     _master->_logMutex.Unlock();
00479     
00480     // Post-process
00481     this->WriteOcc();
00482     this->Reset();
00483 }
00484 
00485 
00486 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::WriteOcc() {
00487     ;
00488 }
00489 
00490 
00491 void KMCParallel::KMCSingleOp::Reset() {
00492     vector< NodeBoxed* > ::iterator nit;
00493     for (nit = _nodes.begin(); nit < _nodes.end(); ++nit) {
00494         (*nit)->Reset();
00495     }
00496     
00497     _pos = vec(0.,0.,0.);
00498     _current = NULL;
00499 }

00503 // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
00504 // VSSM GROUP MEMBERS   //
00505 // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
00506 
00507 template<typename event_t>
00508 void KMCParallel::VSSMGroupBoxed<event_t>::AddEvent(event_t *event) {
00509     
00510     _events.push_back(event);
00511     _acc_rate.push_back(_acc_rate.back() + event->Rate());
00512     
00513     UpdateWaitingTime();
00514 }
00515 
00516 
00517 template<typename event_t>
00518 inline void KMCParallel::VSSMGroupBoxed<event_t>::UpdateWaitingTime() {
00519     
00520     _waiting_time = -log( 1.0 - _random->rand_uniform() ) / Rate();
00521 }
00522   
00523 
00524 template<typename event_t>
00525 inline void KMCParallel::VSSMGroupBoxed<event_t>::OnExecute() {
00526     
00527     SelectEvent_BinarySearch()->OnExecute();
00528     UpdateWaitingTime();
00529 }
00530 
00531 
00532 template<typename event_t>
00533 event_t *KMCParallel::VSSMGroupBoxed<event_t>::SelectEvent_BinarySearch() {
00534         
00535     double max = Rate();
00536     double u = 1.-_random->rand_uniform();
00537     u=u*Rate(); 
00538 
00539     int imin = 0;
00540     int imax = _acc_rate.size();
00541 
00542     while(imax - imin > 1) {
00543             int imid = (int) ((imin+imax)*0.5);
00544             if(u <= _acc_rate[imid]) imax=imid;
00545             else                     imin=imid;
00546     }
00547 
00548     return _events[imin];
00549 }
